alert.note: Alert for Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 27 at 6:16PM EST until February 28 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...North central and northeast Vermont as well as the western portions of Clinton and Essex counties in New York. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 10 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The coldest wind chill values will be right before sunrise and continuing through mid-morning on Monday.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
